description.narrative: The activity will help USAID to continue strengthening national observatories in the Northern Triangle countries and improve regional and national institutional capacity to collect, monitor, and process security information and apply it to policy formulation. USAID will support the development of victimization surveys, regional forums and exchanges, and will continue providing technical assistance to improve citizen security information management in each country. Additionally, USAID will fund sub-grants for capacity building of governmental institutions on citizen security information management, research, and standardization of indicators.
